page.title: 20MAYOR OF MAIDSTONE
page.content: Mrs Rosemary Graham was elected one of three Labour councillors to represent Parkwood and Senacre on the Maidstone Borough Council. She has become particularly interested in people who need houses, attends meetings on their behalf, and tries to get houses built where they are needed. She also deals with roads and transport matters. A councillor, she points out, is not paid. Her husband was also a councillor. Previously she was a Dental Receptionist and also worked for the Navy. She is a great believer in equality. She would like to have been a writer, but has this year been elected Mayor of Maidstone.
